issues.description: The problem statement's UML lists getNameAndTotalNumberOfStudents() with return type void, but the textual task description (lines 44-45) says the method should return a String (format: LectureName (TotalNumberOfStudents)). The solution implementation also returns a String. This inner-artifact contradiction in the problem statement (UML vs. text) can confuse students about the correct method signature to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML in problem_statement.md to match the textual description and the solution: change the method signature to +getNameAndTotalNumberOfStudents(): String. Optionally, add a short note in the template TODO to indicate the method should return a String to avoid ambiguity.
